main event: Bright light observed passing through the sky and unidentified aircraft leaving two vapor streams over Ostan, Iran on February 2, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 3 minutes., There were multiple witnesses including two Iranian fishermen and military personnel., The object was estimated to be flying at 400-500 knots and at an altitude of 10-15,000 feet., The sighted object was initially thought to be a USAF experimental jet plane., The local population speculated it might be Russian missiles causing excitement in the area.
